name: Arapaima
description:
Arapaima is a short game about my experience in the psychiatric facility. The writing is a combination of my experience the first time I was there 4 years ago and the second time I was there this year.

Featuring:
  • 1800+ words
  • 50+ original artworks
  • 6 Endings
  • Fish
Credits:

Made using the Spinoff app on IOS, for the Spinoff Interactive Story Jam.

Writing, music, and direction by nenkaii

AMAZING Art by Kasandra Suarez (Thank you Kas!!!!)
